lead_paragraph: Mark Stone had two goals and an assist and the Ottawa Senators beat the Tampa Bay Lightning 5-1 on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Stone Has 2 Goals, Assist and Sens Beat Lightning 5-1
headline.main: Stone Has 2 Goals, Assist and Sens Beat Lightning 5-1
